sys_script.name: Delete old attatchments

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_5a18a72d871f785005ec65750cbb35a5
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sysapproval_approver</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Delete old attatchments</name><order>2000</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var gsa = new GlideSysAttachment();

	var att = new GlideRecord('sys_attachment');
	att.addQuery('table_name','sysapproval_approver');
	att.addQuery("table_sys_id",current.sys_id);
	att.query();
	while(att.next()){
		gsa.deleteAttachment(att.sys_id);
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>alex</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-10-19 21:43:33</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5a18a72d871f785005ec65750cbb35a5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Delete old attatchments</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="QHS" source="x_epats_qhs">7031c0461be6f050aa2b4371b24bcb49</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="QHS">7031c0461be6f050aa2b4371b24bcb49</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_5a18a72d871f785005ec65750cbb35a5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>alex</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-10-20 09:16:14</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=5a18a72d871f785005ec65750cbb35a5"/></record_update>
